excerpt: "But a shiny new startup, SensoRy A1 launched in Newport Beach May 25 aims to develop a sensory network that will allow for the prediction and early detection of such deadly incidents as the 2018 Camp fire that destroyed the Northern California town of Paradise and killed at least 85 people."
